Taunton.Charles R. Atwood House:
The Charles R. Atwood House is a historic house located at 30 Dean Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The Italianate style single family house was built in about 1850 for Charles R. Atwood, treasurer and agent for the Phoenix Manufacturing Co. The house remained in the Atwood family until the 1930s.
